# Dockerfile to build MXNet for GPU

FROM nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel
ARG version

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y wget python-dev gcc && \
    wget https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py && \
    python get-pip.py && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir mxnet-cu80==$version
